entries.title: Galaxy Book 3 leak spills the beans on the latest Samsung laptops
entries.description: Leaks suggest the high-end Galaxy Book 3 Ultra will launch with a NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 GPU.

entries.title: NAD’s new wireless streamer is a cheap high-res audio upgrade
entries.description: The new NAD CS1 is one of the least expensive options available for adding high-res streaming to an existing music system.

entries.title: Yandex denies it was hacked, says rogue employee to blame for breach
entries.description: Leaker posts "Yandex git sources" on hacking forum, but Russian giant says it wasn't hacked.

entries.title: How your office printer can offer a secret sustainability improvement
entries.description: The Epson EcoTank could help your business do its part in addressing the climate crisis.

entries.title: It sounds like Ubisoft is trying to do a Call of Duty: Warzone with Far Cry
entries.description: Leaked information suggests that Ubisoft may have the next two Far Cry games in the works.

entries.title: Lexmark security bug leaves thousands of its printers open to attack
entries.description: Vendor warns of proof of concept exploits and urges customers to update as soon as possible.

entries.title: Samsung's 65-inch The Frame TV crashes to record-low price ahead Super Bowl
entries.description: Samsung's Super Bowl TV deals include the best-selling 65-inch The Frame TV on sale for a record-low price of $1,599.99.

entries.title: Seagate's top HDDs are all getting a storage boost
entries.description: Seagate is pushing ahead with plans to deliver huge (and even huge-r) HDDs.

entries.title: Toni Collette's new Prime Video thriller series looks electrifying
entries.description: The Power, a new superpower-based thriller series, is coming to Prime Video in March.

entries.title: The Dead Space remake has an amazing feature I won't be using
entries.description: Electronic Arts have added a brilliant accessibility feature that you probably shouldn’t use.

entries.title: Even the star of Fire Emblem Engage can't get a copy of the Nintendo RPG
entries.description: The voice of Fire Emblem Engage’s main character couldn’t get his own preorder fulfilled by GameStop.

entries.title: Monster Hunter has competition because this RPG has something it doesn't
entries.description: A new trailer shows off helicopters, buster swords, and claw blades in upcoming monster-slaying action game Wild Hearts.

entries.title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, Disney Plus and more this weekend (January 27)
entries.description: From new supernatural dramas to subversive rom-coms, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

entries.title: The FBI says it has infiltrated and shut down the notorious Hive ransomware group
entries.description: Joint operation between US and European law enforcement agencies may be cause for celebration, but those in the know are still worried.

entries.title: Ubuntu Pro is now available for everyone to use
entries.description: Following a successful beta testing period with companies like Nvidia and Google, Ubuntu Pro is now available to all.

entries.title: This devious ransomware hijacks the Windows Everything search tool
entries.description: This sneaky ransomware is using Windows Everything to deploy an even more efficient attack, so be on your guard.

entries.title: Playing GoldenEye on my iPad is real, and it's spectacular
entries.description: With the help of Xbox Cloud, Nintendo, an iPad, an 8BitDo controller, and a Game Pass subscription, I'm content.

entries.title: Intel sees huge drop in profits as PC and server markets fall
entries.description: Intel reports a huge dropoff in 2022 profits, but its report might contain some hidden light.

entries.title: Remastering three classics from Apogee Software for a new age
entries.description: While Apogee was bought by 3D Realms back in 1996, its legacy lives on in three games, recently remastered.

entries.title: Exclusive: Lots of us still really don't trust content written by AI
entries.description: Our survey finds continued suspicion around written content produced by artificial intelligence.

entries.title: You can now hide Google Chrome Incognito tabs behind a biometric lock on Android
entries.description: Android phone users can finally hide their Incognito tabs in Google Chrome behind a biometric lock.

entries.title: The Google Pixel Tablet could be the Pixel Tablet Pro in all but name
entries.description: A leak has revealed numerous Pixel Tablet specs and suggests that the rumored Pro model will be the only version.

entries.title: Bitwarden users at risk after potential phishing scam discovered
entries.description: A fake Bitwarden website may have tricked users into divulging their master passwords.

entries.title: Microsoft Teams is finally fixing this ear-splitting annoyance
entries.description: No need for muting when you join a Microsoft Teams call.

entries.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods trailer breakdown: 6 thing you might have missed
entries.description: Here are six thing you might have overlooked in the final trailer for Shazam! Fury of the Gods.

entries.title: Surfshark aces its first no-logs audit
entries.description: Surfshark's users now have the assurance their data is in the hands of a VPN provider operating with the highest privacy standards.

entries.title: Wordle today - hints, clues and answer for game #587, Friday, January 27
entries.description: Looking for hints for today's Wordle? We can help. Plus the solution to yesterday's Wordle and past answers.
